body: Grasshope, Thank you for the extra validation and good catch with the labeling.  I have fixed this with this commit: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/c3b971fc923a56b9...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/c3b971fc923a56b9359e404ed60eceb3786748a3) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz3x6cRcWGFz-6VPeVZDJPHOA8M2mwQfIvODDFDMcxksEFSic1p4Phy00qGHcCC-ct9w*QsFWIbNNiP22r4Fl7nW/SkyExposure.JPG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz2Df8fo31aFT3PnPClTvPjDTExwTzLK11LPHM9lmkazw7zRat-ZFbWMTYfMrhrY60Q8JvFWpOiBXFf040L6bg2Z/SkyViewLabel.JPG) -Chris
